short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill captcha & enable disabled site options on the iTax website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addons is helpful on the Kenya Revenue Authority website

- Reads and prefills the captcha calculations
- Enables browser functionality disabled by the website
